.. _`design_system_components_helpreference`:

HelpReference
=============

.. figure:: images/component_helpreference.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

Renders a help button. Clicking the button will open the help page in a new window.


API Documentation
-----------------

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-components.HelpReference.HelpReference`


Related Components
------------------
:ref:`design_system_components_button`
